thag5.12:1.1: Whatever wise one, <j>understanding their teacher’s words,
thag5.12:1.2: stays with them, their fondness growing;
thag5.12:1.3: that astute person is indeed devoted—
thag5.12:2.2: one who does not tremble, but reflects instead,
thag5.12:2.3: that astute person is indeed strong—
thag5.12:3.2: their wisdom is deep, they see the subtle meaning;
thag5.12:3.3: that astute person is indeed immovable—
thag5.12:4.1: They’re very learned, <j>and have memorized the teaching,
thag5.12:4.2: living in line with the teachings—
thag5.12:4.3: that astute person is indeed such—
thag5.12:5.1: They know the meaning of what is said,
thag5.12:5.3: that astute person is indeed a master of meaning—
